scripts.init: node run-project.js && docker compose up -d --build && docker exec -it MySQL_empremarket /bin/bash -c "sleep 3 && mysql -u root -proot -e 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS empremarket; CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS empremarket;'" && docker exec -it PHP8.2_empremarket /bin/bash -c "sleep 3 && php coreshell migrations:migrate"
scripts.install: node run-project.js && docker compose up -d --build && docker exec -it MySQL_empremarket /bin/bash -c "sleep 3 && mysql -u root -proot -e 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS empremarket; CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS empremarket;'" && docker exec -it PHP8.2_empremarket /bin/bash -c "sleep 3 && php coreshell migrations:migrate"
scripts.dev: docker stop React_empremarket && cd Backoffice && npm run dev
scripts.db: docker exec -it MySQL_empremarket /bin/bash -c "sleep 3 && mysql -u root -proot -e 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS empremarket; CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS empremarket;'" && docker exec -it PHP8.2_empremarket /bin/bash -c "sleep 3 && php coreshell migrations:migrate"
